meanings.sent1: The skittish kitten jumped at the sound of a door closing.
meanings.sent2: The skittish deer ran away at the slightest noise in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The skittish squirrel thought a falling leaf was a monster!
meanings.sent4: Her skittish behavior made her seem like a scared rabbit.
meanings.sent5: The skittish horse trembled at the approaching storm.

meanings.sent1: The skittish puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent2: Children love playing with skittish puppies in the park.
meanings.sent3: The skittish kitten pounced on a moving shadow.
meanings.sent4: Her skittish laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The skittish squirrel leaped from branch to branch with glee.

meanings.sent1: The skittish weather changed from sunny to rainy in minutes.
meanings.sent2: His skittish driving made his passengers nervous.
meanings.sent3: The skittish elevator stopped at every floor for no reason.
meanings.sent4: Her skittish moods kept everyone guessing.
meanings.sent5: The skittish internet connection kept dropping during the call.
